Reviews.Title: Good System
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Only problem is out of one of the camera is not working. Easy setup. Online viewing configuration is bit tricky, If you are techy person then it's not a problem.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: KK
Reviews.Content: I love this system.  I have had it up and running for over a year now.  It give good video and links into my wife's iPhone and my Kindle.  It is recognized on my network and all the PCs in my house are able to view.  I am able to view remotely from other computers as well.Setting up the network with port forwarding can be a little tricky.

Reviews.Title: Great system
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: put the system up in no time remote view works greatwould buy more if it did not cost so much

Reviews.Title: Great upgrade from QC408
Reviews.Author: Danny "I like American History, Politics (Con...
Reviews.Content: Got this from Tiger Direct: This system was easy to set up. I got a seperate 1.5 TB drive and total cost was $$$+++ less then same unit with 500GB drive built in. the on line and moble monitoring are great. Q-see paperwork needs to me updated to indicat there own FREE Moble app that works as well or better then the recomended one. My old system use to show false motion 90% of the time at night and would load up the Hard drive in a much quicker time.

Reviews.Title: Great system
Reviews.Author: NostraDumbass
Reviews.Content: This is a great system.  All the cameras are great quality.  The dvr is very easy to program.  The remote monitoring was a little difficult at first, but once I figured it out, it's the best thing ever.  You can view live and recorded video.  You can even program everything from your computer at home.I suggest you set up remote monitoring first because it makes it much easier to program everything else when you have a keyboard.

Reviews.Title: Poorly engineered and worse support
Reviews.Author: rji1124
Reviews.Content: I am ready to throw mu QSee system in the trash.  Camera quality is poor; download playback software conversion from H264 to AVI is abominable...I finally figured out that it appears that the software provided writes 2 headers on the "AVI" file.. bought a different file converter that ignored the first header.  Cables are poor - I have had to replace 2 of them in less than a year.Software "Support" is non-existent - might as well do your own debugging. Never again...

Reviews.Title: Bought 16 cameras only got 8.
Reviews.Author: Julian A. Medina "Julian"
Reviews.Content: I recently bought the 16 camera system and only 8 cameras arrived, very dissapointing because I don't live in The US and it is impossible to send it back.
